pma:database.name: RomipData
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `$table` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `twitid` bigint(32) NOT NULL, `date` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `text` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL, `sberbank` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `vtb` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `gazprom` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `alfabank` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `bankmoskvy` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `raiffeisen` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `uralsib` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `rshb` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `twitid` (`twitid`) );
